thread.title: Comment on Terrence Williams says he’s Elvis Presley of Louisville basketball by ShepKat
thread.title_full: Comment on Terrence Williams says he’s Elvis Presley of Louisville basketball by ShepKat

author: ShepKat
title: Comment on Terrence Williams says he’s Elvis Presley of Louisville basketball by ShepKat
text:
Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 12 responses to “Terrence Williams says he’s Elvis Presley of Louisville basketball” Rick Pitino's Half Testicle October 12, 2015 at 10:06 am | Permalink | Reply 
I broke one off in T-will. yeahright October 12, 2015 at 10:07 am | Permalink | Reply 
Stay Classy, T-Will. 
I love how guys use “mother s” and “blessing” in the same sentence. Musehobo October 12, 2015 at 10:08 am | Permalink | Reply 
Lol. Look, the dude has a point. Does he need to pay for sex? Probably not. But that doesn’t mean he didn’t. And his response is so classless, he didn’t really come across as believable either. 
But ultimately, yeah, I’d like to see some proof as well. I think we’ve heard all we need to know when it comes to determining whether some of this stuff went on up there (it did). But if she accuses him, specifically, she might want to be prepared to back that up with proof. He could sue her for libel. RealCatsFan October 12, 2015 at 10:09 am | Permalink | Reply 
You mad, T-Will? 
So he said he had fans paying him money for handshakes and autographs while he was at Louisville. Isn’t that an NCAA infraction? Mathlete October 12, 2015 at 10:13 am | Permalink 
You beat me to it! Johnny Football got in a lot of trouble for that stuff, why should “T-will” be any different? cats for life October 12, 2015 at 10:13 am | Permalink | Reply 
Spoken like a true Louisville man lol October 12, 2015 at 10:16 am | Permalink | Reply 
just in case the media wanted a few good quotes to run with RealCatsFan October 12, 2015 at 10:18 am | Permalink | Reply 
Well, if I had the choice, I guess I would rather be the “f**king Elvis Presley” rather than the “fat, drug-addicted Elvis Presley”. Matt Jones's Barber October 12, 2015 at 10:20 am | Permalink | Reply 
“You know what I’d do with a million dollars? Two chicks at the same time man.” CatsBy80 October 12, 2015 at 10:20 am | Permalink | Reply 
is this really what the University of Louisville wants associated with its institution? It’s one thing to say this kind of stuff around your buddies, but to say this stuff to the media is pretty ridiculous. I would say that I’m embarrassed for him, but I’m really not. MikeyLikesIt October 12, 2015 at 10:20 am | Permalink | Reply 
Classy as @*^& October 12, 2015 at 10:22 am | Permalink | Reply 
and UL fans eating this up as proof that nothing happened — at all. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
